languages.text: {n}Очень маловероятно, что существует подобный артефакт — судя по виду конструкции, это просто огромные искусно сделанные весы, не таящие в себе каких-либо машинных духов. Скорее всего, кто-то тайно управляет чашами, чтобы придавать вес приговору Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Очень маловероятно, что существует подобный артефакт — судя по виду конструкции, это просто огромные искусно сделанные весы, не таящие в себе каких-либо машинных духов. Скорее всего, кто-то тайно управляет чашами, чтобы придавать вес приговору Вольного Торговца.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Böyle bir eserin gerçekten var olması pek olası değil. Tasarımına bakılacak olursa her türlü makine ruhundan yoksun, devasa ve ustalıkla işlenmiş bir dizi normal ağırlık terazisinden farkı yok. Birileri Hür Tacir'in kararına derinlik katmak için levhaları gizlice manipüle ediyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Böyle bir eserin gerçekten var olması pek olası değil. Tasarımına bakılacak olursa her türlü makine ruhundan yoksun, devasa ve ustalıkla işlenmiş bir dizi normal ağırlık terazisinden farkı yok. Birileri Hür Tacir'in kararına derinlik katmak için levhaları gizlice manipüle ediyor olmalı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'existence d'un tel artefact vous semble hautement improbable. À l'exception de sa taille colossale et de son excellente facture, il s'agit d'une balance tout à fait ordinaire qui n'abrite certainement pas d'esprits de la machine. Quelqu'un doit manipuler secrètement les plateaux pour donner plus de poids aux verdicts des libres-marchands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'existence d'un tel artefact vous semble hautement improbable. À l'exception de sa taille colossale et de son excellente facture, il s'agit d'une balance tout à fait ordinaire qui n'abrite certainement pas d'esprits de la machine. Quelqu'un doit manipuler secrètement les plateaux pour donner plus de poids aux verdicts des libres-marchands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}そのようなアーティファクトが実在する可能性はきわめて低い。装置の構造から判断するに、それはただの巨大で精巧に作られた通常の天秤にすぎず、いかなる機械精霊も宿していない。おそらく誰かが密かに皿を操作して、ローグトレーダーの判決により深い重みを与えようとしているのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そのようなアーティファクトが実在する可能性はきわめて低い。装置の構造から判断するに、それはただの巨大で精巧に作られた通常の天秤にすぎず、いかなる機械精霊も宿していない。おそらく誰かが密かに皿を操作して、ローグトレーダーの判決により深い重みを与えようとしているのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}执政官口中的造物，实际上不太可能存在。从这台装置的设计上来看，它应该就是一座超大号的天平。尽管工艺精良，但与普通天平并无不同之处，也没有什么所谓的机魂。肯定是有人暗中操纵这座天平的两个托盘，从而让行商浪人的判决看似意味深重。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}执政官口中的造物，实际上不太可能存在。从这台装置的设计上来看，它应该就是一座超大号的天平。尽管工艺精良，但与普通天平并无不同之处，也没有什么所谓的机魂。肯定是有人暗中操纵这座天平的两个托盘，从而让行商浪人的判决看似意味深重。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es poco probable que exista semejante artefacto. A juzgar por el diseño, es solo una balanza normal, aunque de una escala y manufactura excepcionales, que carece de espíritu máquina. Alguien debe de manipular los platos en secreto para añadir más peso al veredicto de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es poco probable que exista semejante artefacto. A juzgar por el diseño, es solo una balanza normal, aunque de una escala y manufactura excepcionales, que carece de espíritu máquina. Alguien debe de manipular los platos en secreto para añadir más peso al veredicto de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist ausgesprochen unwahrscheinlich, dass ein solches Artefakt tatsächlich existiert ... der Machart des Gerätes zufolge handelt es sich dabei um nicht mehr als zugegebenermaßen riesige und von Meisterhand gefertigte Waagschalen ohne jegliche Maschinengeister. Jemand muss die Teller heimlich manipuliert haben, um dem Urteil {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} noch größeres Gewicht zu verleihen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is highly unlikely that such an artefact actually exists — judging by the design of the device, it is nothing more than a set of regular albeit enormous and masterfully crafted weight scales devoid of machine spirits of any kind. Someone must be secretly manipulating the plates in order to add greater profoundness to the Rogue Trader's verdict.{/n}
